text: (napiye!) Nir parkkavillaiya? Niccayamaka allah pumiyilulla anaittaiyum unkalukku vacappatuttik kotukkiran. Kappal avanutaiya kattalaippati katalil celkiratu. Tan anumatiyinri pumiyin mitu vanam vilatu avan tatuttuk kontirukkiran. Niccayamaka allah manitarkal mitu mikka irakkamutaiyavan, karunaiyutaiyavan avan
